problem.p: This is a concept question, provided to check your understanding of the previous video clip.
Which of the following statements about density matrices, and their unravelings into ensembles of pure states, are correct? Check all that apply

choice.text: Every density matrix has an infinite number of unravelings into different probabilistic ensembles of pure states.
Only mixed state density matrices have an infinite number of unravelings into different probabilistic ensembles of pure states.
Two different unravelings of a density matrix can be distinguished by an appropriate experiment, in principle.
Different unravelings of a density matrix can never be distinguished by an appropriate experiment.
Pure states can be represented by density matrices.
Density matrices only represent mixed states.
